faqs.topic: I want to register on DIKSHA
faqs.description:
To sign up on DIKSHA:
  • Go to Explore DIKSHA
  • Select whether you are a teacher or a student
  • Update your location details
  • Click on the profile icon
  • Click Login
  • Click Register here on the login screen
  • For details on how to register refer https://diksha.gov.in/help/getting-started/sign-in/sign-up.html

faqs.topic: I want to login on DIKSHA through my State portal
faqs.description:
To login to DIKSHA through your State portal:

  • Go to Explore DIKSHA 
  • Select that you are a Teacher
  • Select your location 
  • Click the Profile icon
  • Click Login
  • Select Login with State system
  • Select your State
  • You will be redirected to your State portal
  • Enter the User name and Password as given to you by your State in the Login screen 
  • Click Submit
  • For details to log in through the State portal, refer Sign Up

To reset your password, follow these steps and recover your account:

  • Click Forgot Password
  • Enter the email address or mobile number and user name that you provided while registering on DIKSHA

  • You will receive an OTP on your registered email or mobile number

  • Enter the OTP to reset your password and recover your account
  • For details to reset your password, refer Recover password

faqs.topic: I want to edit my profile details
faqs.description:
You can edit the following details in your Profile:
  • Personal details such as name, State, and district
  • Contact details such as a mobile number and email address
  • Other details such as board, medium, subject, and class
    • For details on how to edit profile details, refer User profile

faqs.topic: I want to download my certificate
faqs.description:
All courses do not offer a certificate. If you have completed a course that offers a certificate, go to your profile page, you will see the download icon next to the course name. 

If you are unable to download the certificate on the mobile app,

  • check if you have the latest version of the DIKSHA app. If not, update the app version from the Play store
  • click on the refresh button in the Profiles tab in the Courses attended section
  • In case you are still unable to download the certificate, write to us with:
    • Name of the course
    • Your DIKSHA ID
    • Screenshot of the profile page wherein the course details are displayed

faqs.topic: I want to join a course
faqs.description:
To enrol for a course, you must log in on DIKSHA. 

Navigate to the Courses section and search for the course. For details on joining a course and enrolling for a batch, refer

  • Courses
  • Joining a courses

faqs.topic: I want my course certificate soon after I complete my course
faqs.description: A State authority decides when to issue the certificate for the course.  Few course certificates are issued within 7 days after you complete the course. But, some course certificates will be issued after the duration of the batch ends. Contact your State or course administrator to find out when your certificate will be issued. You will get a notification as soon as your certificate is issued.

faqs.topic: I want to check my course progress
faqs.description: Your course completion (in %) is shown on the top right corner of your course page.

faqs.topic: I want to check if a course provides a certificate
faqs.description: The course card page indicates if the course provides a certificate. A message This is a certificate course is displayed on the course details screen.

faqs.topic: I want to receive a notification after my certificate is issued
faqs.description: You will get a notification on your registered email address or phone number after the certificate is issued.

faqs.topic: I want to change my name on the certificate issued to me
faqs.description: The name on your certificate is the same as that on your profile page. Correct the name on your profile page and contact your State authority. Ask the State authority to send a service request with the required details to the DIKSHA support team to re-issue your certificate. It will take approximately 24 hours or one working day to re-issue the certificate, after receiving the request.

faqs.topic: I have completed my course, but the progress does not show as 100%  completed
faqs.description: The system may take a few hours to sync the progress update, and hence, there may be a delay in showing that you have completed the course. Request you to check after a day.

faqs.topic: I want to contribute content to DIKSHA
faqs.description: To contribute content to DIKSHA, go to the Vidyadaan portal
To search for your course, navigate to the Courses section. Use the course filters to narrow down the search results or type the course name in the search bar and press enter.

faqs.topic: My profile does not reflect my course progress correctly
faqs.description: To update your course progress in your profile, go to My learnings. Click on the Course. After the course opens, go to the kebab menu (three vertical dots on the right)> click Sync progress now. Wait for a few minutes. Your profile should now reflect your correct course progress
